title: The Soldier
description:
You’ve always been the kind of man who won’t tolerate disrespect, who’s proud to go it alone. But when an important protocol is breached, you find yourself in a desperate situation.

Hosted by Hill Harper.

Listen ad-free on Wondery+ here
